channel.title: Problems hosting server on laptop! [URGENT]
channel.description:
Okay, so after quite a while, i finally made a RuneScape Private Server. It's a Rawr Pkz source which I think is a 317. Correct me if i'm wrong. But anyways, the problem is, the server runs perfect on local host(127.0.0.1) but when i switch it to my no-ip, it goes a bit weird. Everything works fine, as in moving the camera, right click over stuff, hovering mouse over items/objects, but then when you try and click move, or click open bank or talk to an NPC, there is a 5-7second delay. The only think I can relate it to, is lag, which to me seems a bit odd as it isn't a frame rate issue, just delay in actions.
My Laptop Specs: http://www.play.com/PC/PCs/4-/3477577/Acer-Aspire-5720-Core-2-Duo-T5250-1-5GHz-2GB-80GB-15-4-DVD-SM-Vista-Home-Premium-Laptop-Notebook/Product.html
Any help would be VERY appreciated as I need a response soon!
-SmellyHD

item.title: Problems hosting server on laptop! [URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @SmellyHD SmellyHD
item.description:
@SmellyHD wrote:

Okay yeah i’m going to put it down to internet connection. Mine doesn’t seem to be the best Anyways, thanks for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Problems hosting server on laptop! [URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

The lag that you are facing may come from 2 different things, 1 of them may be that u have a lousy internet connection (obviously the only way to fix is to upgrade or buy a vps) the 2nd thing that may cause lag is customs, how ever i do now know what u mean by the no-ip, do u mean when other people connect, because u have to connect to local host or nothing at all will work, also if u need more help just ppm me on other questions have a nice day :D.

Read full topic
